review: This product is joke. It will only buffer about 25% of a program or movie, play for about 2 minutes, then have to buffer again (another 25%), play for a couple of minutes, then start all over. This is the same for Netflix, Amazon Prime, HBOgo, etc. (All of which I subscribe to.)  It keeps telling me that it can't connect to my wireless system, although when I check the connections everything is fine--and my signal is strong. It won't hold my settings, either. I can't find anywhere on Amazon's site to talk to tech people for help, which is even more frustrating. I even bought a second fire stick, but may send it back since the first one is worthless. I have a Roku 2 which works fine, so I know it has nothing to of with my wireless connection. My recommendation: don't waste your money on this cheap piece of junk. I don't think I'd even pay for the more expensive Amazon Fire products. My bet is they are just higher priced junk. Stick with Roku.
